WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
i am using WPP version 1.3.1407.29
I have a valid code signature, but while creating the package i am getting error as "verification of signature failed for file"
wsus console version 3.2.7600.256

Actually i am creating the package for ms office 2013 sp1 patch

I have to push new skype for business package to users, it requires KB2817430 and KB2889923.

Any suggestions how to push the patches ?

Please help me
WorkItem.Summary: verification of signature failed for file

Comments.Message:
First i think you have to update both systems, WSUS AND WPP.

In WUS-FAQ No. 44 you can see how old your WSUS-Installation is. http://wsus.de/faq

You need 2 Updates more:
WSUS 3.0 (SP2) + KB2720211: 	Build 3.2.7600.251
WSUS 3.0 (SP2) + KB2734608: 	Build 3.2.7600.256
WSUS 3.0 (SP2) + KB2828185: 	Build 3.2.7600.262
WSUS 3.0 (SP2) + KB2938066: 	Build 3.2.7600.274

After this pls use the actual WPP Version and try again.

Thanks for your reply..
I have updates the issue. please go through it again
